name: Phoenix Wright - Ace Attorney - Trials and Tribulations
synopsis: Throw yourself head-long into a captivating courtroom drama in Ace Attorney: Trials and Tribulations, the fourth release on Nintendo DS for the Ace Attorney series. Ace Attorney: Trials and Tribulations once again sees you taking control of super-slick lawyer Phoenix Wright as you try to prove the innocence of your clients by poring over evidence and picking holes in inconsistent witness testimonies.
